steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Quick Parts' button.
In the 'Field' dialog box, choose the desired field type and options.
Click on the 'OK' button to insert the field into the document.
Repeat steps 4-6 for each field you want to insert.
